Subject: Scheduled Maintenance for AIA and WM9 - 01/03/2025
--------------------------------------------------
 

      

 

 

Notification: Essential Logistics Weekly Maintenance

______________________________________________________________________________

______________________________________________________________________________ 

Dear Colleagues,

 

To ensure business continuity, we have scheduled essential maintenance to enhance the underlying infrastructure of the database systems for WMS and AIA

Saturday, March 01, 2025, | 10:00 PM â€“ 11:59 PM GST

Please be aware that during this period, access to the Warehouse Application (WMS) and Oracle AIA will be temporarily unavailable.

If you require assistance during this time, kindly raise a support ticket via the following  link: https://onereach.chalhoub.com <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/> 

 

Chalhoub Tech.




    If you have any questions, please reach out to the IT Service Desk via One reach Link <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/a/dashboard/default>
